compliant.legal provisions: Transparency and user awareness regarding third-party links and data collection practices.
Data retention policies must be clearly stated, including the duration for which personal data will be retained.

non_compliant.legal provisions: User consent and control over personal data shared with third parties.
non_compliant.amend: Include explicit information on how user consent is obtained and how users can manage their data shared with third parties.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Users should be informed about their rights regarding data deletion and the specific criteria for data retention.
non_compliant.amend: Add details on user rights to request deletion of their data and the criteria used to determine retention periods.
